Sentencas: Increasing demand for power and the depletion of fossil fuels are providing opportunities for the development of fuel cells as power generating systems.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: This paper investigates the integration of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with biomass gasification for the production of power and heat (combined heat and power (CHP) system).
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: A steady-state model was developed in the gPROMS modelling tool to investigate the integrated system.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: The system was modelled for two different options, a cold process involving gas cleaning at a reduced temperature and a hot process involving gas cleaning at a high temperature.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: For each option, the model was used to determine the system efficiency and prospective costs.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency and overall system efficiency for the hot process were found to be 23 and 60% and for the cold process the efficiencies were 21 and 34%, respectively.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: Superior heat management in the gas cleaning stage of the hot process results in its higher system efficiency.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: The capital cost for the hot process appears higher than that for the cold process.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: This differential capital cost may be justified by the income earned from selling the extra heat produced in the hot process.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems

Sentencas: Conversely, the cold process produces a gas stream with lower levels of impurities than the hot process.
Titulo: Modelling system efficiencies and costs of two biomass-fuelled SOFC systems
